headline: Private Credit Looks to Scale Ahead of Expected M&A Wave
summary: (Bloomberg) -- For private credit lenders, a focus next year will be on achieving scale, as the average size of transactions swell and the gates open for mergers and acquisitions, according to Blackstone Inc. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. executives.
